attributes.action: Get all football related death mocking off facbook and football terrices for good
attributes.additional_details: Lets bring respect back into football we need to stop all the football related death mocking on the terrices ,football shirts and facebook too , whether its a football disaster , aplayer or a member of a players family the total lack of respect has to stop there is no place for it .legislation needs bringing in place where police and other authorities can act immediaty including facebook ,all football fans can do this and stand together and say enough is enough  ! no more anti hillsborough ,anti munich or other death mocking chants ,no more football death mocking pages on facebook either lets stamp this out now !!
